@NikkiHaley @GregAbbott_TX ❗️American’s, Biden’s mental decline and 40 years of failed persona / policies are responsible for the war in Ukraine. The world cannot just roll-over and allow - all this pain and suffering. We cannot be afraid of a war with Russia.

@NikkiHaley @GregAbbott_TX Voters need to ask themselves what political party is most Putin like…most authoritarian…most fascist. Look for clues like book banning and suppression of voting and women’s rights. Defeat the oppressors! Fight fascism like our parents and grandparents did!
